version_description:
5.1.1:
-Supported new Action Cam FDR-X1000V and HDR-AS200V.
-Displays Sound Photo icon when transfer mode(for Sound Photo compatible camera only) -Changes operating environment: iOS 7.0-8.1

Note
Please authorize photo permissions for PlayM

5.2.0:
-Design improvement of top screen
Playing/sharing photos from the top screen is available.
-New feature: Multi Camera Control
Control up to 5 Action Cams simultaneously on this app. Compatible Action Cams(FDR-X1000V or HDR-AS200V) and W

5.3.0:
-Add hashtags to the images which are shared from this app
-Show the link of lens compatibility information in [Help/Instruction manuals] if interchangeable lens digital camera has been connected
-Become possible to receive news when you a

5.3.1:
- Supported iOS9.0
- Improved operational stability
5.3.0:
- Add hashtags to the images which are shared from this app
- Show the link of lens compatibility information in [Help/Instruction manuals] if interchangeable lens digital c

5.3.2:
- Improved issue that some screens are displayed in English even if the language is set in other languages
5.3.1:
- Supported iOS9.0
- Improved operational stability
5.3.0:
- Add hashtags to the images which are shared from this

5.4.0:
- Bulb shooting, continuous shooting etc.
- Wi-Fi connection setting by QR code
- Other operability improvement
Features above will be available with PlayMemories Camera Apps* compatible cameras by updating “Smart Remote Control” app Ve

5.5.0:
- Supported HDR-AS50.
- Improved operational stability.
- For users of Action Cam.
Name of interval function changed to timelapse.

5.6.0:
- Improved operational stability.
- For users of Action Cam.
Name of "interval" function changed to "timelapse".

5.7.0
- Now iOS 10 is supported.
- Supports the Location Information function of the α99 II.

5.8.0
-Improved remote shooting UI similar to the operability of the camera body
-Now, you can send App Satisfaction Level from the app
-Some Action Cam and Lens-Style Cameras supported for QR code connection
-Supported Shortcut menu for 3D To

5.9.0
-Added shooting setting buttons when the smartphone is in landscape orientation.
-You can review the settings of the transferred images.

6.0.0
- Supports proxy movie transfer function of the RX10 IV.

6.1.0
- Supports RX0.
- By connecting RX0 to a smartphone via Wi-Fi and using the app, you can now remotely check up to 5 view angles at the same time from Live View, and also take photos or apply settings at once.

6.1.1:
- Fixed the problem on iOS11 which caused the app to crash when remote shooting with some cameras.

6.1.0:
- Supports RX0.
- By connecting RX0 to a smartphone via Wi-Fi and using the app, you can now remotely check up to 5 view angle

6.2.0:
- RX0 can now connect and control up to 50* devices via a commercial Wi-Fi access point.
*The number of connected devices varies depending on the corresponding access point, smartphones, signal status, installation method and so on.

6.2.1:
- The privacy policy has been updated.
- Supported the iPhone X Super Retina display.

- 已簡化與相機的第二次和後續連線作業。
- 您可以在 [我的頁面] 上使用 Sony account 登入，查看有關相機的最新資訊。

- 已簡化與相機的第二次和後續連線作業。
- 您可以在 [我的頁面] 上使用 Sony account 登入，查看有關相機的最新資訊。

- Fixed an issue where a network error occurs after starting the app in some languages and the app cannot be used.
- To connect to the camera for the second time or later, activate the Wi-Fi function on the camera and then select the camera from the "

- The app crashes when launching the app or during image transfer.
- Image sending and remote shooting are not possible even though the iPhone/iPad is connected to the camera via Wi-Fi.
- The connected camera is not saved in the camera list.
Improved the stability with iOS7.
